name: Lost in the Reef (yourgeekeric)
description:
Lost in the Reef

Made by Ben Lawrence, Eric Rogers, and Melisa Rogers

You are lost behind enemy lines. Collect resources while fighting enemies that happened to find you. You must upgrade your ship to prepare for when the beacon is activated. When the beacon is activated, not only your comrades will find you. 

Skybox, and Sound where not made by us.
